name: Flip Chess
description:
A game of chess with cards where you flip the cards face down.

How To Play:

1.

In the planning phase, select two pieces to swap.

Once you are happy with your layout, hit the 'Finish Planning' button.

2.

Basic chess rules apply:

When it is your turn, select a piece you would like to move. All of the possible moves will be highlighted.

Moving a piece will flip it face up. revealing it to your opponent.

3.
Capture the opponent's King to win the game.
